event: normal blood urea nitrogen/creatinine (BUN/Cr) of 11.0/0.8 mg/dL
no medication administered on the morning of surgery
bupivacaine (0.5%, 10 mg) injected into the subarachnoid space at T10
intravenous dexmedetomidine infused (0.5 μg/kg/min for first 10 min, then at 0.4-0.6 μg/kg/min)
pneumatic thigh tourniquet applied intraoperatively at 300 mmHg for 100 min
total anesthesia time of 2 hours and 10 minutes
antibiotics (Refosporen, 1 g and cefazedone sodium 1 g) injected bid
severe pain on the right thigh
right thigh stiff and dark brown
urine output every 8 h after operation of 100 mL, 220 mL, 250 mL
continued deterioration of laboratory parameters in ICU
mild small vessel disease on brain MRI
red blood cell count of 100/high powered field (HPF)
arterial line placed in left radial artery
central line secured in right internal jugular vein
fluid loading with normal saline at 400 mL/h for 2 h
sodium bicarbonate (40 mL injection of 8.4%) administered
urine output of 110 mL for first 3 h
urine output of 600 mL for next 4 h
